definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
wonton/see also 餛飩|馄饨[hun2 tun5]

sentences.english: I always add a little Madeira to the liquid when I stew prunes.
sentences.chinese: 在炖李子时我常加些马德拉葡萄酒在汤里。

sentences.english: How about we have a beef and tomato stew to start?
sentences.chinese: 我们先点个牛肉炖西红柿怎么样？

sentences.english: Oh, dad, your stew makes my mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 噢，爸，你炖得菜香得让我流口水了。

sentences.english: As for beef, we Chinese would prefer it stewed with potatoes or tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 至于牛肉，中国人喜欢和西红柿和土豆一起炖。

sentences.english: Simmer until nectarines are tender but still hold shape, about 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 炖至油桃软烂但仍然保持块状，约需10分钟。

sentences.english: The gentle acidity and marked fruitiness of a well balanced Pinot Gris perfectly complements roast pork with a stewed pear sauce.
sentences.chinese: 水果香味丰裕浓烈，完美融合了炖梨酱烤猪肉的美味。

sentences.english: Her casserole recipes. But we hate them.
sentences.chinese: 她的乱炖食谱，但是我们恨它们。

sentences.english: Make an infusion by boiling and simmering the rhubarb and camomile together.
sentences.chinese: 将大黄和甘菊一起煮沸再用文火炖，熬成汤药。

sentences.english: Which cut of meat would you recommend for a stew?
sentences.chinese: 如果炖的话，你推荐使用哪块肉？

sentences.english: Recommended preparations include grilling, broiling , braising and pan-roasting.
sentences.chinese: 推荐大家用烤，烧，炖或者煎的方法来制作。

sentences.english: Make an infusion by boiling and simmering the rhubarb and camomile together…
sentences.chinese: 将大黄和甘菊一起煮沸再用文火炖，熬成汤药。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo optimize the technologies of processing in Heshouwu braised.
sentences.chinese: 目的优化黑豆汁炖何首乌炮制工艺。

sentences.english: She browned onions before adding them to the stew.
sentences.chinese: 她先炒洋葱再把洋葱加入炖的食物。

sentences.english: She chopped the carrots for the stew.
sentences.chinese: 她把胡萝卜切碎放在炖的菜里。

sentences.english: I give you the chicken soup, Bubu body.
sentences.chinese: 我给你炖了鸡汤，补补身子。

sentences.english: Bring the mixture to a boil, cover, then reduce the heat to maintain a simmer. Cook for 2 hours.
sentences.chinese: 锅烧开，盖上盖子，调到小火继续炖2个小时。

definition: to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
to cook slowly over a low flame/pot/saucepan
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
(of food etc) soft/pulpy/(Tw) (of a person) lacking drive/shiftless/lazy
